responsibilities: Develop and refine predictive models for personal lines pricing using Generalized Linear Models (GLMs) in R and Python.
Perform quarterly loss reserving analysis using Chain-Ladder and Bornhuetter-Ferguson methods to ensure adequate solvency.
Collaborate with the underwriting department to evaluate risk selection criteria and adjust pricing tiers based on loss ratio trends.
Automated recurring data extraction and reporting workflows using SQL, reducing manual processing time by 30%.
Supported the valuation of defined benefit pension plans by calculating present values of future benefits.
Maintained and updated Excel-based financial models with current market data and mortality assumptions.
Assisted in the preparation of actuarial valuation reports and government filings for mid-sized corporate clients.
Conducted sensitivity analysis on interest rate fluctuations to determine the impact on plan funding ratios.
